name: Methodist Healthcare System of San Antonio, Ltd., L.l.p.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Methodist Healthcare System of San Antonio, Ltd., L.l.p. is a Clinic/Center, Ambulatory Surgical provider based in San Antonio, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $68.0M in Medicaid payments across 857K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $68.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
